title: Integers (as a subset of complex numbers)

blocks.name: cz
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the class of integers.
blocks.origin: const class cz { ℤ }

blocks.name: diff.cz.s
diff.cz.c
diff.cz.w
df-z
blocks.content: Define the set of integers, which are the positive and negative integers together with zero. Definition of integers in [Apostol] p. 22. The letter Z abbreviates the German word Zahlen meaning "numbers." (Contributed by NM, 8-Jan-2002.)

blocks.name: elz
blocks.content: Membership in the set of integers. (Contributed by NM, 8-Jan-2002.)
blocks.origin:
thm elz(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(c0, cr), w3o(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn))))
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cz, cr, w3o(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn)), w3o(wceq(cv(hs0), nat0), wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), cn)))
  3orbi123d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0), wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), cn), wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, nat0)
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, cn)
  eleq1d(cneg(cv(hs0)), cn, cneg(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  negeq(cv(hs0), c0)
  df-z(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(w3o(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elz(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℤ ↔(c0 ∈ ℝ ∧(c0 = 0 ∨ c0 ∈ ℕ ∨ -u(c0)∈ ℕ)))
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cz, cr, (c0 = 0 ∨ c0 ∈ ℕ ∨ -u(c0)∈ ℕ), (hs0 = 0 ∨ hs0 ∈ ℕ ∨ -u(hs0)∈ ℕ))
  3orbi123d(hs0 = c0, hs0 = 0, hs0 ∈ ℕ, -u(hs0)∈ ℕ, c0 = 0, c0 ∈ ℕ, -u(c0)∈ ℕ)
  eqeq1(hs0, c0, nat0)
  eleq1(hs0, c0, cn)
  eleq1d(-u(hs0), cn, -u(c0), hs0 = c0)
  negeq(hs0, c0)
  df-z(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 = 0 ∨ c0 ∈ ℕ ∨ -u(c0)∈ ℕ))
}

blocks.name: nnnegz
blocks.content: The negative of a positive integer is an integer. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2002.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnnegz(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cz))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cz), wcel(cneg(c0), cr), w3o(wceq(cneg(c0), nat0), wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wcel(cneg(cneg(c0)), cn)))
  renegcld(c0, wcel(c0, cn))
  nnre(c0)
  3mix3d(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cneg(c0), nat0), wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wcel(cneg(cneg(c0)), cn))
  mpcom(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(cneg(c0)), cn), wcel(c0, cc))
  nncn(c0)
  biimprd(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(cneg(c0)), cn))
  eleq1d(cneg(cneg(c0)), cn, c0, wcel(c0, cc))
  negneg(c0)
  elz(cneg(c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nnnegz(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℕ → -u(c0)∈ ℤ)
} = {
  sylanbrc(c0 ∈ ℕ, -u(c0)∈ ℤ, -u(c0)∈ ℝ, (-u(c0)= 0 ∨ -u(c0)∈ ℕ ∨ -u(-u(c0))∈ ℕ))
  renegcld(c0, c0 ∈ ℕ)
  nnre(c0)
  3mix3d(c0 ∈ ℕ, -u(c0)= 0, -u(c0)∈ ℕ, -u(-u(c0))∈ ℕ)
  mpcom(c0 ∈ ℕ, -u(-u(c0))∈ ℕ, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  nncn(c0)
  biimprd(c0 ∈ ℂ, c0 ∈ ℕ, -u(-u(c0))∈ ℕ)
  eleq1d(-u(-u(c0)), cn, c0, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  negneg(c0)
  elz(-u(c0))
}

blocks.name: zre
blocks.content: An integer is a real. (Contributed by NM, 8-Jan-2002.)

blocks.name: zcn
blocks.content: An integer is a complex number. (Contributed by NM, 9-May-2004.)

blocks.name: zrei
blocks.content: An integer is a real number. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jul-2005.)

blocks.name: zssre
blocks.content: The integers are a subset of the reals. (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-2004.)

blocks.name: zsscn
blocks.content: The integers are a subset of the complex numbers. (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-2004.)

blocks.name: zex
blocks.content: The set of integers exists. See also ~ zexALT . (Contributed by NM, 30-Jul-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: elnnz
blocks.content: Positive integer property expressed in terms of integers. (Contributed by NM, 8-Jan-2002.)
blocks.origin:
thm elnnz(class c0) {

} = {

  impbii(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0)))), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))
  jca31(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c0, cr), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0))), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  nnre(c0)
  orc(wcel(c0, cn), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  nngt0(c0)
  imp31(wcel(c0, cr), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0))), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wcel(c0, cn))
  com23(wcel(c0, cr), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0))), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wcel(c0, cn))
  ex(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wi(wo(wcel(c0, cn), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0))), wcel(c0, cn)))
  jaod(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wcel(c0, cn), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0)), wcel(c0, cn))
  idd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wcel(c0, cn))
  pm2.21d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0)), wcel(c0, cn))
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wn(wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0))), wn(wcel(cneg(c0), cn)), wn(wceq(c0, nat0)))
  nsyl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)))
  imp(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wn(wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0))))
  sylbid(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wn(wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0))), wbr(cneg(c0), clt, nat0))
  lt0neg2(c0)
  sylancl(wcel(c0, cr), wi(wbr(cneg(c0), clt, nat0), wn(wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)))), wcel(cneg(c0), cr), wcel(nat0, cr))
  renegcl(c0)
  0re()
  ltnsym(cneg(c0), nat0)
  nngt0(cneg(c0))
  neneqd(c0, nat0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))
  gt0ne0(c0)
  ioran(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0))
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0)))))
  bitri(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0)))), wa(wcel(c0, cr), w3o(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn))))
  elz(c0)
  anbi2i(wcel(c0, cr), w3o(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn)), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0))))
  bitri(w3o(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn)), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0))), w3o(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  3orrot(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn))
  3orass(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0))

blocks.name: elnn0z
blocks.content: Nonnegative integer property expressed in terms of integers. (Contributed by NM, 9-May-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm elnn0z(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)))
} = {
  3bitri(wcel(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0)), wo(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wceq(nat0, c0)))
  elnn0(c0)
  orbi12i(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wceq(nat0, c0))
  elnnz(c0)
  eqcom(c0, nat0)
  3bitr4i(wo(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wceq(nat0, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)), wa(wo(wcel(c0, cz), wceq(nat0, c0)), wo(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wceq(nat0, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wo(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wceq(nat0, c0))))
  anbi1i(wo(wcel(c0, cz), wceq(nat0, c0)), wo(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wceq(nat0, c0)), wcel(c0, cz))
  impbii(wo(wcel(c0, cz), wceq(nat0, c0)), wcel(c0, cz))
  jaoi(wcel(c0, cz), wceq(nat0, c0), wcel(c0, cz))
  id(wcel(c0, cz))
  mpbii(wceq(nat0, c0), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(nat0, cz))
  0z()
  eleq1(nat0, c0, cz)
  orc(wcel(c0, cz), wceq(nat0, c0))
  ordir(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wceq(nat0, c0))
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wo(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wceq(nat0, c0)))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, cz), wb(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wo(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wceq(nat0, c0))), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  0re()
  zre(c0)
  leloe(nat0, c0)
}

blocks.name: elznn0nn
blocks.content: Integer property expressed in terms nonnegative integers and positive integers. (Contributed by NM, 10-May-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm elznn0nn(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cz), wo(wcel(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cn))))
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cz), wo(wcel(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cn))), wa(wcel(c0, cr), w3o(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn))))
  elz(c0)
  3bitr4i(wa(wcel(c0, cr), w3o(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn))), wo(wcel(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cn))), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wo(wo(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn)), wcel(cneg(c0), cn))), wo(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wo(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn))), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cn))))
  andi(wcel(c0, cr), wo(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn)), wcel(cneg(c0), cn))
  anbi2i(wcel(c0, cr), w3o(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn)), wo(wo(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn)), wcel(cneg(c0), cn)))
  df-3or(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn))
  orbi1i(wcel(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cn)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wo(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn))))
  bitri(wcel(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wo(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn))), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cn0)))
  pm4.71ri(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, cr))
  nn0re(c0)
  anbi2i(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cn0), wo(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn)))
  bitri(wcel(c0, cn0), wo(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn)), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  elnn0(c0)
  orcom(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0))
}

blocks.name: elznn0
blocks.content: Integer property expressed in terms of nonnegative integers. (Contributed by NM, 9-May-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm elznn0(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wo(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cneg(c0), cn0))))

  elz(c0)
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, cr), w3o(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn)), wo(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cneg(c0), cn0)))
  syl6rbb(wcel(c0, cr), w3o(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn)), wo(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cneg(c0), cn0)), wo(wo(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0)), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0))))
  orbi12d(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cneg(c0), cn0), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0)), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wcel(c0, cn0), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0))))
  elnn0(c0)
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cn0), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0)), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(cneg(c0), nat0)))
  elnn0(cneg(c0))
  orbi2d(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(cneg(c0), nat0), wceq(c0, nat0))
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cneg(c0), nat0), wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(cneg(nat0), c0))
  sylancl(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wceq(cneg(c0), nat0), wceq(cneg(nat0), c0)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat0, cc))
  recn(c0)
  0cn()
  negcon1(c0, nat0)
  bitri(wceq(cneg(nat0), c0), wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(nat0, c0))
  eqeq1i(cneg(nat0), c0, nat0)
  neg0()
  eqcom(nat0, c0)
  3bitrri(wo(wo(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0)), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0))), w3o(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn)), wo(wceq(c0, nat0), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn))), wo(wo(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn)), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  3orass(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn))
  orcom(wceq(c0, nat0), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn)))
  orordir(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0))

blocks.name: elznn

thm elznn(class c0) {

  orbi2d(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn0), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  syl6rbbr(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cn0), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0)), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(cneg(c0), nat0)))

  negeq0d(c0, wcel(c0, cr))
  recn(c0)

  bitri(w3o(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn)), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wo(wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0))), w3o(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn), wceq(c0, nat0)))

blocks.name: zle0orge1
blocks.content: There is no integer in the open unit interval, i.e., an integer is either less than or equal to ` 0 ` or greater than or equal to ` 1 ` . (Contributed by AV, 4-Jun-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm zle0orge1(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cz), wo(wbr(c0, cle, nat0), wbr(nat1, cle, c0)))
} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cz), wo(wbr(c0, cle, nat0), wbr(nat1, cle, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn0))))
  elznn(c0)
  orcomd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn0))), wbr(c0, cle, nat0), wbr(nat1, cle, c0))
  imp(wcel(c0, cr), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn0)), wo(wbr(nat1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, nat0)))
  orim12d(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cneg(c0), cn0), wbr(nat1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, nat0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cr), wi(wcel(c0, cn), wbr(nat1, cle, c0)))
  nnge1(c0)
  syl5bi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cn0), wbr(c0, cle, nat0), wa(wcel(cneg(c0), cz), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c0))))
  elnn0z(cneg(c0))
  adantld(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cz), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c0)), wbr(c0, cle, nat0))
  biimprd(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c0)), wbr(c0, cle, nat0))
  le0neg1(c0)
}

blocks.name: elz2
blocks.content: Membership in the set of integers. Commonly used in constructions of the integers as equivalence classes under subtraction of the positive integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm elz2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cz), wrex(s0, cn, wrex(s1, cn, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cmin, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {

  1nn()
  simpr(c0 ∈ ℝ, -u(c0)∈ ℕ0)

  nncn(s0)
  nncn(s1)
  negsubdi2(s0, s1)
  anbi12d(c0 =(s0[-]s1), c0 ∈ ℝ, (c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∨ -u(c0)∈ ℕ0), (s0[-]s1)∈ ℝ, ((s0[-]s1)∈ ℕ0 ∨ -u((s0[-]s1))∈ ℕ0))
  eleq1(c0, (s0[-]s1), cr)

  |- wceq(cz, cima(cmin, cxp(cn, cn)))
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, cz, cima(cmin, cxp(cn, cn)))
  bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cmin, cxp(cn, cn))), wrex(hs1, cn, wrex(hs2, cn, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cmin, cv(hs2))))))

thm dfz2() {
  ⊢ ℤ =(- "(ℕ × ℕ))
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, cz, (- "(ℕ × ℕ)))
  bitr4i(hs0 ∈ ℤ, hs0 ∈(- "(ℕ × ℕ)), ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℕ, hs0 =(hs1[-]hs2))))
  elz2(hs1, hs2, hs0)
  mp2an((hs0 ∈(- "(ℕ × ℕ))↔ ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℕ, hs0 =(hs1[-]hs2)))), -[Fn](ℂ × ℂ), (ℕ × ℕ)⊆(ℂ × ℂ))
  ax-mp(-[Fn](ℂ × ℂ), (- :(ℂ × ℂ)→ ℂ))
  subf()
  ffn(cmin, (ℂ × ℂ), cc)
  mp2an((ℕ × ℕ)⊆(ℂ × ℂ), ℕ ⊆ ℂ, ℕ ⊆ ℂ)
  nnsscn()
  xpss12(cn, cc, cn, cc)
  ovelimab(hs1, hs2, cmin, (ℂ × ℂ), cn, cn, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c((- "(ℕ × ℕ)))

  imdistani(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat1, cle, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  mpani(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat1, cle, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, nat1))
  0lt1()
  mp3an12i(wcel(c0, cz), wi(wa(wbr(nat0, clt, nat1), wbr(nat1, cle, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(c0, cr))

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ)→(c0[+]c1)∈ ℤ)
} = {
  syl2anb(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, (c0[+]c1)∈ ℤ, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ, c0 =(hs0[-]hs1))), ∃(hs2 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3 ∈ ℕ, c1 =(hs2[-]hs3))))
  elz2(hs0, hs1, c0)
  elz2(hs2, hs3, c1)
  sylbir((∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ, c0 =(hs0[-]hs1)))∧ ∃(hs2 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3 ∈ ℕ, c1 =(hs2[-]hs3)))), (c0[+]c1)∈ ℤ, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℕ,(∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ, c0 =(hs0[-]hs1))∧ ∃(hs3 ∈ ℕ, c1 =(hs2[-]hs3))))))
  reeanv(hs0, hs2, cn, cn, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ, c0 =(hs0[-]hs1)), ∃(hs3 ∈ ℕ, c1 =(hs2[-]hs3)))
  rexlimivv(hs0, hs2, cn, cn, (∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ, c0 =(hs0[-]hs1))∧ ∃(hs3 ∈ ℕ, c1 =(hs2[-]hs3))), (c0[+]c1)∈ ℤ)
  syl5bir((hs0 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs2 ∈ ℕ), (∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ, c0 =(hs0[-]hs1))∧ ∃(hs3 ∈ ℕ, c1 =(hs2[-]hs3))), (c0[+]c1)∈ ℤ, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3 ∈ ℕ,(c0 =(hs0[-]hs1)∧ c1 =(hs2[-]hs3)))))
  reeanv(hs1, hs3, cn, cn, c0 =(hs0[-]hs1), c1 =(hs2[-]hs3))
  rexlimdvva(hs1, hs3, cn, cn, (hs0 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs2 ∈ ℕ), (c0 =(hs0[-]hs1)∧ c1 =(hs2[-]hs3)), (c0[+]c1)∈ ℤ)
  syl5ibrcom(((hs0 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs2 ∈ ℕ)∧(hs1 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs3 ∈ ℕ)), (c0 =(hs0[-]hs1)∧ c1 =(hs2[-]hs3)), (c0[+]c1)∈ ℤ, ((hs0[-]hs1)[+](hs2[-]hs3))∈ ℤ)
  sylibr(((hs0 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs2 ∈ ℕ)∧(hs1 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs3 ∈ ℕ)), ((hs0[-]hs1)[+](hs2[-]hs3))∈ ℤ, ∃(hs4 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs5 ∈ ℕ,((hs0[-]hs1)[+](hs2[-]hs3))=(hs4[-]hs5))))
  syl3anc(((hs0 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs2 ∈ ℕ)∧(hs1 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs3 ∈ ℕ)), ∃(hs4 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs5 ∈ ℕ,((hs0[-]hs1)[+](hs2[-]hs3))=(hs4[-]hs5))), (hs0[+]hs2)∈ ℕ, (hs1[+]hs3)∈ ℕ, ((hs0[-]hs1)[+](hs2[-]hs3))=((hs0[+]hs2)[-](hs1[+]hs3)))
  adantr((hs0 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs2 ∈ ℕ), (hs1 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs3 ∈ ℕ), (hs0[+]hs2)∈ ℕ)
  nnaddcl(hs0, hs2)
  adantl((hs0 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs2 ∈ ℕ), (hs1 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs3 ∈ ℕ), (hs1[+]hs3)∈ ℕ)
  nnaddcl(hs1, hs3)
  eqcomd(((hs0[-]hs1)[+](hs2[-]hs3)), ((hs0[+]hs2)[-](hs1[+]hs3)), ((hs0 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs2 ∈ ℕ)∧(hs1 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs3 ∈ ℕ)))
  syl2an((hs0 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs2 ∈ ℕ), (hs1 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs3 ∈ ℕ), ((hs0[+]hs2)[-](hs1[+]hs3))=((hs0[-]hs1)[+](hs2[-]hs3)), (hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs2 ∈ ℂ), (hs1 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs3 ∈ ℂ))
  anim12i(hs0 ∈ ℕ, hs2 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈ ℂ, hs2 ∈ ℂ)

thm zrevaddcl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cz), wb(wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c0), cz)), wcel(c1, cz)))
} = {
  syl6bbr(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c0), cz)), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c1, cz)))
  pm5.32da(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c0), cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c0), cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c0), cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  eqeltrrd(c1, cz, co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cmin, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c0), cz)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c0), cz), wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cmin, c0), c1))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cmin, c0), c1))
  sylan2(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cz), wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cmin, c0), c1), wcel(c0, cc))
  zcn(c0)
  pncan(c1, c0)
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c0), cz), wcel(co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cmin, c0), cz))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c0), cz), wcel(co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cmin, c0), cz))
  zsubcl(co(c1, caddc, c0), c0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cc), wi(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c0), cz)))
  expcom(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c0), cz))
  zaddcl(c1, c0)
  pm4.71ri(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcn(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm zrevaddcl(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℤ →((c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1[+]c0)∈ ℤ)↔ c1 ∈ ℤ))
} = {
  syl6bbr(c0 ∈ ℤ, (c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1[+]c0)∈ ℤ), c1 ∈ ℤ, (c1 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ))
  pm5.32da(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℂ, (c1[+]c0)∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ)
  impbid((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ), (c1[+]c0)∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ)
  ex((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ), (c1[+]c0)∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ)
  eqeltrrd(c1, cz, ((c1[+]c0)[-]c0), ((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)∧(c1[+]c0)∈ ℤ))
  adantr((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ), (c1[+]c0)∈ ℤ, ((c1[+]c0)[-]c0)= c1)
  ancoms(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℂ, ((c1[+]c0)[-]c0)= c1)
  sylan2(c1 ∈ ℂ, c0 ∈ ℤ, ((c1[+]c0)[-]c0)= c1, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  zcn(c0)
  pncan(c1, c0)
  adantlr(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℂ, (c1[+]c0)∈ ℤ, ((c1[+]c0)[-]c0)∈ ℤ)
  ancoms(c0 ∈ ℤ, (c1[+]c0)∈ ℤ, ((c1[+]c0)[-]c0)∈ ℤ)
  zsubcl((c1[+]c0), c0)
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℂ, (c1 ∈ ℤ →(c1[+]c0)∈ ℤ))
  expcom(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, (c1[+]c0)∈ ℤ)
  zaddcl(c1, c0)
  pm4.71ri(c1 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  zcn(c1)
}

  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wa(wcel(co(c1, cmin, c0), cz), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmin, c0))), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmin, c0)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmin, c0))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  zre(c0)
  zre(c1)
  posdif(c0, c1)
  biantrurd(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmin, c0)), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c0), cz))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c0), cz))
  zsubcl(c1, c0)
  elnnz(co(c1, cmin, c0))
}

blocks.name: nzadd
blocks.content: The sum of a real number not being an integer and an integer is not an integer. (Contributed by AV, 19-Jul-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm nzadd(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(cr, cz)), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdif(cr, cz)))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(cr, cz)), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdif(cr, cz)), wa(wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr), wn(wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cz))))
  sylanb(wcel(c0, cdif(cr, cz)), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr), wn(wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cz))), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wcel(c0, cz))))
  eldif(c0, cr, cz)
  jca(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wcel(c0, cz))), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr), wn(wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cz)))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wcel(c0, cz)), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  zre(c1)
  readdcl(c0, c1)
  imp31(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wcel(c0, cz)), wcel(c1, cz), wn(wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cz)))
  com23(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wcel(c0, cz)), wcel(c1, cz), wn(wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cz)))
  ex(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wi(wn(wcel(c0, cz)), wn(wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cz))))
  con3d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cz))
  sylibd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cz), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), cz))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wi(wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cz), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), cz)))
  expcom(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cz), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), cz))
  zsubcl(co(c0, caddc, c1), c1)
  eleq1d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), cz, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), c0), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  recn(c0)
  zcn(c1)
  pncan(c0, c1)
  eldif(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr, cz)
}

  syl6ibr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wo(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cneg(c0), cn0)), wo(wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(cneg(c1), cn0))), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cz), wa(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr), wo(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn0), wcel(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), cn0))))
  ccased(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cneg(c0), cn0), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(cneg(c1), cn0), wa(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr), wo(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn0), wcel(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), cn0))))
  jctild(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr), wo(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn0), wcel(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), cn0)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wo(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn0), wcel(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), cn0))))
  orcd(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn0), wcel(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), cn0))
  nn0mulcl(c0, c1)
  jctild(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cneg(c0), cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr), wo(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn0), wcel(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), cn0)))
  syl6(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cneg(c0), cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wo(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn0), wcel(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), cn0)), wcel(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), cn0))
  syl5ib(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cneg(c0), cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), cn0), wcel(co(cneg(c0), cmul, c1), cn0))
  nn0mulcl(cneg(c0), c1)
  eleq1d(co(cneg(c0), cmul, c1), cn0, cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(cneg(c0), cmul, c1), cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  mulneg1(c0, c1)
  jctild(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cneg(c1), cn0)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr), wo(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn0), wcel(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), cn0)))
  syl6(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cneg(c1), cn0)), wo(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn0), wcel(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), cn0)), wcel(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), cn0))
  syl5ib(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cneg(c1), cn0)), wcel(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), cn0), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cneg(c1)), cn0))
  nn0mulcl(c0, cneg(c1))
  eleq1d(co(c0, cmul, cneg(c1)), cn0, cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cneg(c1)), cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  mulneg2(c0, c1)
  olc(wcel(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), cn0), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn0))
  jctild(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cneg(c0), cn0), wcel(cneg(c1), cn0)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr), wo(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn0), wcel(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), cn0)))
  syl6(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cneg(c0), cn0), wcel(cneg(c1), cn0)), wo(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn0), wcel(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), cn0)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn0))
  syl5ib(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cneg(c0), cn0), wcel(cneg(c1), cn0)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn0), wcel(co(cneg(c0), cmul, cneg(c1)), cn0))
  nn0mulcl(cneg(c0), cneg(c1))
  eleq1d(co(cneg(c0), cmul, cneg(c1)), cn0, co(c0, cmul, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(cneg(c0), cmul, cneg(c1)), co(c0, cmul, c1)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  recn(c0)
  recn(c1)

  orc(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn0), wcel(cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), cn0))
  remulcl(c0, c1)

blocks.name: zltp1le
blocks.content: Integer ordering relation. (Contributed by NM, 10-May-2004.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 16-May-2014.)

thm zltp1le(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1)))
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1))
  3imtr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c0), cn), wbr(nat1, cle, co(c1, cmin, c0)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wi(wcel(co(c1, cmin, c0), cn), wbr(nat1, cle, co(c1, cmin, c0))))
  nnge1(co(c1, cmin, c0))
  znnsub(c0, c1)
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1), wbr(nat1, cle, co(c1, cmin, c0))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  mp3an2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wb(wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1), wbr(nat1, cle, co(c1, cmin, c0))), wcel(nat1, cr))
  1re()
  leaddsub2(c0, nat1, c1)
  mpand(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  ltp1d(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1)), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cr))
  zre(c0)
  peano2re(c0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c1, cr))
  zre(c1)
  ltletr(c0, co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)
}

thm zlem1lt(class c0, class c1) {

  peano2zm(c0)

  adantr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), c0))

thm nn0le2is012(class c0) {

  jaoi(wbr(c0, clt, nat2), wceq(c0, nat2), wi(wcel(c0, cn0), w3o(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c0, nat1), wceq(c0, nat2))))
  com12(wbr(c0, clt, nat2), wcel(c0, cn0), w3o(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c0, nat1), wceq(c0, nat2)))
  sylbid(wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(c0, clt, nat2), w3o(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c0, nat1), wceq(c0, nat2)), wbr(c0, cle, nat1))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(c0, clt, nat2), wbr(c0, cle, nat1), wbr(c0, cle, co(nat2, cmin, nat1)))
  sylancl(wcel(c0, cn0), wb(wbr(c0, clt, nat2), wbr(c0, cle, co(nat2, cmin, nat1))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(nat2, cz))
  nn0z(c0)
  2z()
  zltlem1(c0, nat2)
  breq2d(c0, cle, co(nat2, cmin, nat1), nat1, wcel(c0, cn0))

  jaoi(wbr(c0, clt, nat1), wceq(c0, nat1), wi(wcel(c0, cn0), w3o(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c0, nat1), wceq(c0, nat2))))
  com12(wbr(c0, clt, nat1), wcel(c0, cn0), w3o(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c0, nat1), wceq(c0, nat2)))
  syl6bi(wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(c0, clt, nat1), w3o(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c0, nat1), wceq(c0, nat2)), wceq(c0, nat0))

  sylan2b(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)))
  elnnz(c1)
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))

  ad2antrl(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(nat0, clt, c1), wcel(c1, cr))
  zre(c1)
  simprr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
  ge0div(c0, c1)

thm zdiv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {

} = {
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz)), wb(wrex(s0, cz, wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cz)), wne(c0, nat0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wne(c0, nat0))

  syl2an(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wi(wne(c0, nat0), wb(wrex(s0, cz, wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cz))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  nncn(c0)
  zcn(c1)
  3expia(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wb(wrex(s0, cz, wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cz)))
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wrex(s0, cz, wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cz))
  rexlimdva2(s0, cz, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cz))
  eqeltrrd(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cz, cv(s0), wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), c1)))
  sylan9req(cv(s0), co(c1, cdiv, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), cdiv, c0), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), c1))
  3adantl2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), cdiv, c0), cv(s0)))
  sylan2(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), cdiv, c0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  zcn(cv(s0))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(s0), cc), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), cdiv, c0), cv(s0)))
  3coml(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(s0), cc), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), cdiv, c0), cv(s0)))
  divcan3(cv(s0), c0)
  oveq1(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), c1, cdiv, c0)
  simplr(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), c1))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wi(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cz), wrex(s0, cz, wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), c1))), wceq(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c0)), c1))
  3com12(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wceq(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c0)), c1))
  divcan2(c1, c0)
  expcom(wceq(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c0)), c1), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cz), wrex(s0, cz, wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), c1)))
  rspcev(s0, co(c1, cdiv, c0), cz, wceq(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c0)), c1), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), c1))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), c1, co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c1, cdiv, c0)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), co(c1, cdiv, c0), c0, cmul)
  diff.w3a.s(s0, wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c0, nat0))

blocks.name: zdivadd
blocks.content: Property of divisibility: if ` D ` divides ` A ` and ` B ` then it divides ` A + B ` . (Contributed by NM, 3-Oct-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm zdivadd(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cz), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c0), cz))), wcel(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cdiv, c0), cz))
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cdiv, c0), cz, co(co(c1, cdiv, c0), caddc, co(c2, cdiv, c0)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cz), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c0), cz))))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cz), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c0), cz)), wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cdiv, c0), co(co(c1, cdiv, c0), caddc, co(c2, cdiv, c0))))
  3comr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cdiv, c0), co(co(c1, cdiv, c0), caddc, co(c2, cdiv, c0))))
  syl3an(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cdiv, c0), co(co(c1, cdiv, c0), caddc, co(c2, cdiv, c0))), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)))
  zcn(c1)
  zcn(c2)
  jca(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0))
  nncn(c0)
  nnne0(c0)
  divdir(c1, c2, c0)
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cz), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c0), cz)), wcel(co(co(c1, cdiv, c0), caddc, co(c2, cdiv, c0)), cz))
  zaddcl(co(c1, cdiv, c0), co(c2, cdiv, c0))
}

blocks.origin:
thm zdivmul(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cz)), wcel(co(co(c2, cmul, c1), cdiv, c0), cz))
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(co(c2, cmul, c1), cdiv, c0), cz, co(c2, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c0)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cz)))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cz), wceq(co(co(c2, cmul, c1), cdiv, c0), co(c2, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c0))))
  3comr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wceq(co(co(c2, cmul, c1), cdiv, c0), co(c2, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c0))))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c0, cn)), wceq(co(co(c2, cmul, c1), cdiv, c0), co(c2, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c0))), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c2, cc))
  zcn(c2)
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcn(c1)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)))
  jca(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0))
  nncn(c0)
  nnne0(c0)
  divass(c2, c1, c0)
  3ad2antl3(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cz), wcel(co(c2, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c0)), cz))
  zmulcl(c2, co(c1, cdiv, c0))
}

blocks.name: zextle
blocks.content: An extensionality-like property for integer ordering. (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm zextle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wral(s0, cz, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))), wceq(c0, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3impia(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wral(s0, cz, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wceq(c0, c1))
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wral(s0, cz, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wceq(c0, c1), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wral(s0, cz, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))
  jca(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wral(s0, cz, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wral(s0, cz, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wral(s0, cz, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cz), wral(s0, cz, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wbr(c0, cle, c0))
  leidd(c0, wcel(c0, cz))
  rspcva(s0, c0, cz, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  breq1(cv(s0), c0, cle, c0)
  breq1(cv(s0), c0, cle, c1)
  adantll(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wral(s0, cz, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wral(s0, cz, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c1))
  adantr(wcel(c1, cz), wral(s0, cz, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wbr(c1, cle, c1))
  leidd(c1, wcel(c1, cz))
  rspcva(s0, c1, cz, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)), wb(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c1)))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c1))
  breq1(cv(s0), c1, cle, c0)
  breq1(cv(s0), c1, cle, c1)
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  zre(c0)
  zre(c1)
  letri3(c0, c1)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.wb.s(s0, wbr(c0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cle, c0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cle, c1)
  diff.wb.s(s0, wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c1))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c1, cle, c0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c1, cle, c1)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: zextlt
blocks.content: An extensionality-like property for integer ordering. (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm zextlt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wral(s0, cz, wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)))), wceq(c0, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3impia(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wral(s0, cz, wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wceq(c0, c1))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wral(s0, cz, wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, cz, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))))
  ralbidva(s0, cz, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)), wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))
  ancoms(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wb(wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)), wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))))
  bibi12d(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz))), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))
  adantrr(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, cmin, nat1))))
  zltlem1(cv(s0), c0)
  adantrl(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))
  zltlem1(cv(s0), c1)
  sylibd(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wral(s0, cz, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, cmin, nat1), co(c1, cmin, nat1)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wi(wral(s0, cz, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))), wceq(co(c0, cmin, nat1), co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cz), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cz))
  peano2zm(c0)
  peano2zm(c1)
  3expia(wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cz), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cz), wral(s0, cz, wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))), wceq(co(c0, cmin, nat1), co(c1, cmin, nat1)))
  zextle(s0, co(c0, cmin, nat1), co(c1, cmin, nat1))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, nat1), co(c1, cmin, nat1)), wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcn(c0)
  zcn(c1)
  mp3an3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, nat1), co(c1, cmin, nat1)), wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(nat1, cc))
  ax-1cn()
  subcan2(c0, c1, nat1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cz)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cz)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cmin, nat1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cmin, nat1)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: recnz
blocks.content: The reciprocal of a number greater than 1 is not an integer. (Contributed by NM, 3-May-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm recnz(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wn(wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cz)))
} = {
  mt2d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cz), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat1))
  simprd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat1), wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)))
  sylibd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cz), wn(wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat1)), wbr(nat1, cle, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)))
  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat1))
  recgt1i(c0)
  zgt0ge1(co(nat1, cdiv, c0))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wb(wbr(nat1, cle, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), wn(wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat1))), wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cr))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cr), wne(c0, nat0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wne(c0, nat0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))
  imdistani(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  mpani(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, nat1))
  0lt1()
  mp3an12(wcel(c0, cr), wi(wa(wbr(nat0, clt, nat1), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(nat1, cr))
  0re()
  1re()
  lttr(nat0, nat1, c0)
  gt0ne0(c0)
  rereccl(c0)
  lenlt(nat1, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))
}

blocks.name: btwnnz
blocks.content: A number between an integer and its successor is not an integer. (Contributed by NM, 3-May-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm btwnnz(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wn(wcel(c1, cz)))
} = {
  3impia(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wn(wcel(c1, cz)))
  con2d(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wbr(c1, clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wcel(c1, cz))
  impancom(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wcel(c1, cz), wn(wbr(c1, clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  biimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wn(wbr(c1, clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wn(wbr(c1, clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1))
  zltp1le(c0, c1)
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1), wn(wbr(c1, clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  syl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cr), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cz))
  peano2z(c0)
  zre(co(c0, caddc, nat1))
  zre(c1)
  lenlt(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)
}

blocks.name: gtndiv
blocks.content: A larger number does not divide a smaller positive integer. (Contributed by NM, 3-May-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm gtndiv(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wn(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cz)))
} = {
  mp3an2i(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wn(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cz)), wcel(nat0, cz), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cdiv, c0)), wbr(co(c1, cdiv, c0), clt, co(nat0, caddc, nat1)))
  0z()
  divgt0d(c1, c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
  syl6breqr(co(c1, cdiv, c0), clt, co(nat0, caddc, nat1), nat1, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  mpbird(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wbr(co(c1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat1), wbr(c1, clt, c0))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, clt, c0))
  bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wbr(co(c1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat1), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, clt, co(nat1, cmul, c0)))
  syl12anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wb(wbr(co(c1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat1), wbr(c1, clt, co(nat1, cmul, c0))), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wcel(c1, cr))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, clt, c0))
  3impia(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  mpand(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
  nngt0(c1)
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn), wi(wa(wbr(nat0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))
  sylan(wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c0, cr), wi(wa(wbr(nat0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  nnre(c1)
  mp3an1(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wi(wa(wbr(nat0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wcel(nat0, cr))
  0re()
  lttr(nat0, c1, c0)
  mp3an2(wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wb(wbr(co(c1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat1), wbr(c1, clt, co(nat1, cmul, c0))), wcel(nat1, cr))
  1re()
  ltdivmul2(c1, nat1, c0)
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wb(wbr(c1, clt, co(nat1, cmul, c0)), wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  breq2d(c1, clt, co(nat1, cmul, c0), c0, wcel(c0, cr))
  mulid2d(c0, wcel(c0, cr))
  recn(c0)
  0p1e1()
  btwnnz(nat0, co(c1, cdiv, c0))
}

blocks.name: halfnz
blocks.content: One-half is not an integer. (Contributed by NM, 31-Jul-2004.)

blocks.name: 3halfnz
blocks.content: Three halves is not an integer. (Contributed by AV, 2-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm 3halfnz() {
  |- wn(wcel(co(nat3, cdiv, nat2), cz))
} = {
  mp3an(wn(wcel(co(nat3, cdiv, nat2), cz)), wcel(nat1, cz), wbr(nat1, clt, co(nat3, cdiv, nat2)), wbr(co(nat3, cdiv, nat2), clt, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)))
  1z()
  mpbi(wbr(nat1, clt, co(nat3, cdiv, nat2)), wbr(co(nat1, cmul, nat2), clt, nat3))
  eqbrtri(co(nat1, cmul, nat2), clt, nat3, nat2)
  mulid2i(nat2)
  2cn()
  2lt3()
  mp3an(wb(wbr(co(nat1, cmul, nat2), clt, nat3), wbr(nat1, clt, co(nat3, cdiv, nat2))), wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(nat3, cr), wa(wcel(nat2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2)))
  1re()
  ltmuldiv(nat1, nat3, nat2)
  mpbir(wbr(co(nat3, cdiv, nat2), clt, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)), wbr(nat3, clt, co(nat2, cmul, nat2)))
  mpbir(wbr(nat3, clt, co(nat2, cmul, nat2)), wbr(nat3, clt, nat4))
  3lt4()
  breq2i(nat3, clt, co(nat2, cmul, nat2), nat4)
  2t2e4()
  bitri(wbr(co(nat3, cdiv, nat2), clt, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)), wbr(nat3, clt, co(nat2, cmul, nat2)), wbr(co(nat3, cdiv, nat2), clt, nat2))
  breq2i(co(nat3, cdiv, nat2), clt, co(nat1, caddc, nat1), nat2)
  1p1e2()
  mp3an(wb(wbr(co(nat3, cdiv, nat2), clt, nat2), wbr(nat3, clt, co(nat2, cmul, nat2))), wcel(nat3, cr), wcel(nat2, cr), wa(wcel(nat2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2)))
  3re()
  pm3.2i(wcel(nat2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2))
  2re()
  2pos()
  ltdivmul(nat3, nat2, nat2)
  btwnnz(nat1, co(nat3, cdiv, nat2))
}

blocks.name: suprzcl
blocks.content: The supremum of a bounded-above set of integers is a member of the set. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Mar-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm suprzcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, cz), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))), wcel(csup(c0, cr, clt), c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

blocks.name: msqznn
blocks.content: The square of a nonzero integer is a positive integer. (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-2004.)

blocks.name: zneo
blocks.content: No even integer equals an odd integer (i.e. no integer can be both even and odd). Exercise 10(a) of [Apostol] p. 28. (Contributed by NM, 31-Jul-2004.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 18-May-2014.)

  eleq1d(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c1, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), caddc, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(c0, cmin, nat1))))
  oveq1(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), caddc, nat1)

  syl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c1)))), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), caddc, nat1), co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), caddc, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))

  diff.wcel.s(s1, co(nat1, caddc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), c1)

blocks.name: peano5uzti
blocks.content: Peano's inductive postulate for upper integers. (Contributed by NM, 6-Jul-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jul-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm peano5uzti(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cz), wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c1))), wss(crab(s1, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1))), c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  dedth(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz), wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c1))), wss(crab(s1, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1))), c1)), wi(wa(wcel(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz)), c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c1))), wss(crab(s1, cz, wbr(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz)), cle, cv(s1))), c1)))
  imbi12d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c1))), wss(crab(s1, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1))), c1), wa(wcel(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz)), c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c1))), wss(crab(s1, cz, wbr(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz)), cle, cv(s1))), c1))
  anbi1d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))), wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c1)), wcel(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz)), c1))
  eleq1(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz)), c1)
  sseq1d(crab(s1, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1))), c1, crab(s1, cz, wbr(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz)), cle, cv(s1))), wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))))
  rabbidv(s1, cz, wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz)), cle, cv(s1)))
  breq1(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz)), cle, cv(s1))
  peano5uzi(s0, s1, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz)), c1)
  elimel(c0, cz, nat1)
  1z()
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c0, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz)))
  diff.cif.s(s0, c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cz)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.cif.s(s1, c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cz)
  diff.cz.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm peano5uzti(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℤ →((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(s0[+]1)∈ c1))→ { s1 ∈ ℤ | c0[≤]s1 } ⊆ c1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  dedth(c0, nat1, c0 ∈ ℤ, ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(s0[+]1)∈ c1))→ { s1 ∈ ℤ | c0[≤]s1 } ⊆ c1), ((if(c0 ∈ ℤ, c0, 1)∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(s0[+]1)∈ c1))→ { s1 ∈ ℤ | if(c0 ∈ ℤ, c0, 1)[≤]s1 } ⊆ c1))
  imbi12d(c0 = if(c0 ∈ ℤ, c0, 1), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(s0[+]1)∈ c1)), { s1 ∈ ℤ | c0[≤]s1 } ⊆ c1, (if(c0 ∈ ℤ, c0, 1)∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(s0[+]1)∈ c1)), { s1 ∈ ℤ | if(c0 ∈ ℤ, c0, 1)[≤]s1 } ⊆ c1)
  anbi1d(c0 = if(c0 ∈ ℤ, c0, 1), c0 ∈ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(s0[+]1)∈ c1), if(c0 ∈ ℤ, c0, 1)∈ c1)
  eleq1(c0, if(c0 ∈ ℤ, c0, 1), c1)
  sseq1d({ s1 ∈ ℤ | c0[≤]s1 }, c1, { s1 ∈ ℤ | if(c0 ∈ ℤ, c0, 1)[≤]s1 }, c0 = if(c0 ∈ ℤ, c0, 1))
  rabbidv(s1, cz, c0 = if(c0 ∈ ℤ, c0, 1), c0[≤]s1, if(c0 ∈ ℤ, c0, 1)[≤]s1)
  breq1(c0, if(c0 ∈ ℤ, c0, 1), cle, s1)
  peano5uzi(s0, s1, if(c0 ∈ ℤ, c0, 1), c1)
  elimel(c0, cz, nat1)
  1z()
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c0, if(c0 ∈ ℤ, c0, 1))
  diff.cif.s(s0, c0, nat1, c0 ∈ ℤ)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cz)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.cif.s(s1, c0, nat1, c0 ∈ ℤ)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cz)
  diff.cz.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: dfuzi
blocks.content: An expression for the upper integers that start at ` N ` that is analogous to ~ dfnn2 for positive integers. (Contributed by NM, 6-Jul-2005.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfuzi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wceq(crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), cint(cab(s1, wa(wcel(c0, cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wcel(c0, cz)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  eqssi(crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), cint(cab(s1, wa(wcel(c0, cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), cv(s1)))))))
  mpgbir(s1, wss(crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), cint(cab(s1, wa(wcel(c0, cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), cv(s1))))))), wi(wa(wcel(c0, cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), cv(s1)))), wss(crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), cv(s1))))
  ssintab(s1, crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), cv(s1)))))
  peano5uzi(s2, s0, c0, cv(s1))
  ax-mp(wss(cint(cab(s1, wa(wcel(c0, cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), cv(s1)))))), crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), cab(s1, wa(wcel(c0, cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), cv(s1)))))))
  mpbir2an(wcel(crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), cab(s1, wa(wcel(c0, cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)))), wral(s2, crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))))))
  mpbir2an(wcel(c0, crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c0))
  leidi(c0)
  zrei(c0)
  elrab(s0, c0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, cle, c0))
  breq2(cv(s0), c0, c0, cle)
  rgen(s2, crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)))))
  mpan(wcel(cv(s2), crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, cz))
  peano2uz2(s0, c0, cv(s2))
  elab(s1, crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(c0, crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)))), wral(s2, crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)))))))
  rabex(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)))
  zex()
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), cv(s1))), wcel(c0, crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)))), wral(s2, crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))))))
  eleq2(cv(s1), crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), c0)
  raleqbi1dv(s2, cv(s1), crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), cv(s1)), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)))))
  eleq2(cv(s1), crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1))
  intss1(crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), cab(s1, wa(wcel(c0, cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), cv(s1))))))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cle, c0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)))), wral(s2, crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))))))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))))
  diff.wral.s(s1, s2, crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)))))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))))
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s2), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)))

  diff.wbr.s(s1, c0, cle, cv(s0))
  diff.cle.s(s1)

  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.crab.s(s2, s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)))
  diff.cz.s(s2)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, c0, cle, cv(s0))
  diff.cle.s(s2)

blocks.name: uzind
blocks.content: Induction on the upper integers that start at ` M ` . The first four hypotheses give us the substitution instances we need; the last two are the basis and the induction step. (Contributed by NM, 5-Jul-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm uzind(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)), wb(w1, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wi(wcel(c0, cz), w2)
  -| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1))), wi(w3, w4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  simprrd(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), w0, wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  3impib(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), w0)))
  3imtr3g(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), w0)), wcel(c1, crab(hs0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c1, crab(s0, cz, wa(wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), w1))))
  sseld(c1, crab(hs0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0))), crab(s0, cz, wa(wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), w1)), wcel(c0, cz))
  mp2and(wcel(c0, cz), wss(crab(hs0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0))), crab(s0, cz, wa(wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), w1))), wcel(c0, crab(s0, cz, wa(wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), w1))), wral(s1, crab(s0, cz, wa(wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), w1)), wcel(co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1), crab(s0, cz, wa(wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), w1)))))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c0, crab(s0, cz, wa(wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), w1))), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c0), w2)))
  ancli(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c0), w2))
  jca(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c0), w2)
  leidd(c0, wcel(c0, cz))

  pm2.43a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wi(wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1), w0))
  com34(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1), w0)

  peano2z(c0)
  3exp(wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1), wi(wcel(c0, cz), w0))
  uzind(s0, s1, co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1, wi(wcel(c0, cz), w0), wi(wcel(c0, cz), w1), wi(wcel(c0, cz), w2), wi(wcel(c0, cz), w3), wi(wcel(c0, cz), w4))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cz), w1, w2)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(c0, cz), w1, w3)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cz), w1, w4)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c0, cz), w1, w0)
  a1i(wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cz), wi(wcel(c0, cz), w2))
  a2d(w3a(wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, cv(s1))), wcel(c0, cz), w3, w4)

  imp(wcel(cv(s1), cz), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, cv(s1)), wi(wcel(c0, cz), wi(w3, w4)))

blocks.name: uzind3
blocks.content: Induction on the upper integers that start at an integer ` M ` . The first four hypotheses give us the substitution instances we need, and the last two are the basis and the induction step. (Contributed by NM, 26-Jul-2005.)

thm uzind3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))))), w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wb(w1, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1)), wb(w1, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wi(wcel(c0, cz), w2)
  -| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))))), wi(w3, w4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w3)
  -| diffsw(s1, w4)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))))), w0), diffss(s0, s1))
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)))), w0, wa(wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  elrab(s0, c1, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  breq2(cv(s0), c1, c0, cle)
  3expb(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1), w0)
  uzind(s1, s2, c0, c1, w0, w1, w2, w3, w4)
  3impb(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(s2), cz), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s2)), wi(w3, w4))
  sylan2br(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cz), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s2))), wi(w3, w4), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s0, cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)))))
  elrab(s0, cv(s2), cz, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s2)))
  breq2(cv(s0), cv(s2), c0, cle)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cle, c1)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cle, cv(s2))
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm uzind3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ { s0 ∈ ℤ | c0[≤]s0 })→ w0)
  ⊣ (s1 = c0 →(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s1 = s2 →(w1 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s1 =(s2[+]1)→(w1 ↔ w4))
  ⊣ (s1 = c1 →(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ (c0 ∈ ℤ → w2)
  ⊣ ((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ s2 ∈ { s0 ∈ ℤ | c0[≤]s0 })→(w3 → w4))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w2)
  ⊣ d(s1, w3)
  ⊣ d(s1, w4)
  ⊣ d(s2, w1)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ { s0 ∈ ℤ | c0[≤]s0 })→ w0), d(s0, s1))
  sylan2b(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ { s0 ∈ ℤ | c0[≤]s0 }, w0, (c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c0[≤]c1))
  elrab(s0, c1, cz, c0[≤]s0, c0[≤]c1)
  breq2(s0, c1, c0, cle)
  3expb(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c0[≤]c1, w0)
  uzind(s1, s2, c0, c1, w0, w1, w2, w3, w4)
  3impb(c0 ∈ ℤ, s2 ∈ ℤ, c0[≤]s2, (w3 → w4))
  sylan2br(c0 ∈ ℤ, (s2 ∈ ℤ ∧ c0[≤]s2), (w3 → w4), s2 ∈ { s0 ∈ ℤ | c0[≤]s0 })
  elrab(s0, s2, cz, c0[≤]s0, c0[≤]s2)
  breq2(s0, s2, c0, cle)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cle, c1)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cle, s2)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
}

blocks.name: nn0ind
blocks.content: Principle of Mathematical Induction (inference schema) on nonnegative integers. The first four hypotheses give us the substitution instances we need; the last two are the basis and the induction step. (Contributed by NM, 13-May-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0ind(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), nat0), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)), wb(w1, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| w2
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s1), cn0), wi(w3, w4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cn0), w0, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)))
  elnn0z(c0)
  mp3an1(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), w0, wcel(nat0, cz))
  0z()
  uzind(s0, s1, nat0, c0, w0, w1, w2, w3, w4)
  a1i(wcel(nat0, cz), w2)
  3adant1(wcel(nat0, cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1)), wi(w3, w4))
  sylbir(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cz), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1))), wi(w3, w4), wcel(cv(s1), cn0))
  elnn0z(cv(s1))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nn0ind(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℕ0 → w0)
  ⊣ (s0 = 0 →(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w1 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s0 =(s1[+]1)→(w1 ↔ w4))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ w2
  ⊣ (s1 ∈ ℕ0 →(w3 → w4))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w4)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  sylbi(c0 ∈ ℕ0, w0, (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ 0[≤]c0))
  elnn0z(c0)
  mp3an1(c0 ∈ ℤ, 0[≤]c0, w0, 0 ∈ ℤ)
  0z()
  uzind(s0, s1, nat0, c0, w0, w1, w2, w3, w4)
  a1i(0 ∈ ℤ, w2)
  3adant1(0 ∈ ℤ, s1 ∈ ℤ, 0[≤]s1, (w3 → w4))
  sylbir((s1 ∈ ℤ ∧ 0[≤]s1), (w3 → w4), s1 ∈ ℕ0)
  elnn0z(s1)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: nn0indALT
blocks.content: Principle of Mathematical Induction (inference schema) on nonnegative integers. The last four hypotheses give us the substitution instances we need; the first two are the basis and the induction step. Either ~ nn0ind or ~ nn0indALT may be used; see comment for ~ nnind . (Contributed by NM, 28-Nov-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0indALT(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), w0)
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(w1, w2))
  -| w3
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), nat0), wb(w4, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w4, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), wb(w4, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wb(w4, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w3)
} = {
  nn0ind(s1, s0, c0, w0, w4, w3, w1, w2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nn0indALT(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℕ0 → w0)
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ ℕ0 →(w1 → w2))
  ⊣ w3
  ⊣ (s1 = 0 →(w4 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s1 = s0 →(w4 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (s1 =(s0[+]1)→(w4 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s1 = c0 →(w4 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w4)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w2)
  ⊣ d(s1, w3)
} = {
  nn0ind(s1, s0, c0, w0, w4, w3, w1, w2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: nn0indd
blocks.content: Principle of Mathematical Induction (inference schema) on nonnegative integers, a deduction version. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Mar-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0indd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cn0)), w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), nat0), wb(w2, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w2, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)), wb(w2, w5))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w2, w1))
  -| wi(w0, w3)
  -| wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cn0)), w4), w5)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w5)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
} = {
  impcom(w0, wcel(c0, cn0), w1)
  nn0ind(s0, s1, c0, wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2), wi(w0, w3), wi(w0, w4), wi(w0, w5))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), nat0), w0, w2, w3)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, w2, w4)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)), w0, w2, w5)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0, w2, w1)
  a2d(wcel(cv(s1), cn0), w0, w4, w5)
  expcom(wcel(cv(s1), cn0), w0, wi(w4, w5))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cn0)), w4, w5)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w3)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w4)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w5)
  diff.wi.s(s1, w0, w2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nn0indd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ ℕ0)→ w1)
  ⊣ (s0 = 0 →(w2 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w2 ↔ w4))
  ⊣ (s0 =(s1[+]1)→(w2 ↔ w5))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w2 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (w0 → w3)
  ⊣ (((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ0)∧ w4)→ w5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w5)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w2)
} = {
  impcom(w0, c0 ∈ ℕ0, w1)
  nn0ind(s0, s1, c0, (w0 → w1), (w0 → w2), (w0 → w3), (w0 → w4), (w0 → w5))
  imbi2d(s0 = 0, w0, w2, w3)
  imbi2d(s0 = s1, w0, w2, w4)
  imbi2d(s0 =(s1[+]1), w0, w2, w5)
  imbi2d(s0 = c0, w0, w2, w1)
  a2d(s1 ∈ ℕ0, w0, w4, w5)
  expcom(s1 ∈ ℕ0, w0, (w4 → w5))
  ex((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ0), w4, w5)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w3)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w4)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w5)
  diff.wi.s(s1, w0, w2)
}

  ltle(nat0, c0)
  impcom(wcel(c0, cz), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cz), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, c0)), wi(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wi(w3, w4)))
  expd(w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cz), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, c0)), wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wi(w3, w4))
  3impa(wcel(cv(s1), cz), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, c0), wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)), wi(w3, w4)))
  expcom(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cz), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), clt, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)), wi(w3, w4))
  syl2anbr(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cz), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), clt, c0)), wi(w3, w4), wcel(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cn0), wbr(cv(s1), clt, c0)))
  elnn0z(c0)
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(s1), cn0), wbr(cv(s1), clt, c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cz), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1))))
  elnn0z(cv(s1))
  3expb(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cv(s1), cn0), wbr(cv(s1), clt, c0), wi(w3, w4))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: nn0ind-raph
blocks.content: Principle of Mathematical Induction (inference schema) on nonnegative integers. The first four hypotheses give us the substitution instances we need; the last two are the basis and the induction step. Raph Levien remarks: "This seems a bit painful. I wonder if an explicit substitution version would be easier." (Contributed by Raph Levien, 10-Apr-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0ind-raph(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), nat0), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)), wb(w1, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| w2
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s1), cn0), wi(w3, w4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn0), w0), diffsw(s0, w2))

  vtocle(s0, nat0, wi(wceq(cv(s1), nat0), w3))
  com12(wceq(cv(s0), nat0), wceq(cv(s1), nat0), w3)

  syl6bir(wceq(cv(s1), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), nat1), wb(w1, w4), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)))
  eqeq2d(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1), nat1, wceq(cv(s1), nat0))
  syl6eq(co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1), nat1, co(nat0, caddc, nat1), wceq(cv(s1), nat0))

  0p1e1()
  sbceq1a(s0, nat1, w1)
  syl(wcel(cv(s1), cn), wi(w3, w4), wcel(cv(s1), cn0))

  eqcoms(c0, nat0, w0)
  vtoclef(s0, nat0, wi(wceq(nat0, c0), w0))

  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), nat0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, wceq(nat0, c0), w0)

thm nn0ind-raph(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℕ0 → w0)
  ⊣ (s0 = 0 →(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w1 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s0 =(s1[+]1)→(w1 ↔ w4))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ w2
  ⊣ (s1 ∈ ℕ0 →(w3 → w4))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w4)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ ℕ0 → w0), d(s0, w2))
  sylbi(c0 ∈ ℕ0, w0, (c0 ∈ ℕ ∨ c0 = 0))
  elnn0(c0)
  jaoi(c0 ∈ ℕ, c0 = 0, w0)
  nnind(hs0, s1, c0, w0, [hs0 / s0]w1, [1 / s0]w1, w3, w4)
  dfsbcq2(hs0, s0, nat1, w1)
  sbhypf(hs0, s0, s1, w1, w3)
  nfv(s0, w3)
  sbhypf(hs0, s0, (s1[+]1), w1, w4)
  nfv(s0, w4)
  sbhypf(hs0, s0, c0, w1, w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  vtoclef(s0, nat1, [1 / s0]w1)
  nfsbc1v(s0, nat1, w1)
  1ex()
  mpbid(s0 = 1, [1 / s0]w1, w1)
  vtocle(s1, nat0, (s0 = 1 → w1))
  ex(s1 = 0, s0 = 1, w1)
  mpbird((s1 = 0 ∧ s0 = 1), w1, w4)
  adantr(s1 = 0, s0 = 1, w4)
  sylc(s1 = 0, w4, s1 ∈ ℕ0, w3)
  ax-mp((s1 = 0 → s1 ∈ ℕ0), 0 ∈ ℕ0)
  0nn0()
  eleq1a(nat0, cn0, s1)
  vtocle(s0, nat0, (s1 = 0 → w3))
  com12(s0 = 0, s1 = 0, w3)
  mpbii(s1 = 0, (s0 = 0 → w3), (s0 = 0 → w1))
  mpbiri(s0 = 0, w1, w2)
  pm5.74d(s1 = 0, s0 = 0, w1, w3)
  syl6bir(s1 = 0, s0 = 0, (w1 ↔ w3), s0 = s1)
  eqeq2(s1, nat0, s0)
  imp(s1 = 0, s0 = 1, (w1 ↔ w4))
  syl6bir(s1 = 0, s0 = 1, (w1 ↔ w4), s0 =(s1[+]1))
  eqeq2d(s0, (s1[+]1), nat1, s1 = 0)
  syl6eq((s1[+]1), nat1, (0[+]1), s1 = 0)
  oveq1(s1, nat0, caddc, nat1)
  0p1e1()
  sbceq1a(s0, nat1, w1)
  syl(s1 ∈ ℕ, (w3 → w4), s1 ∈ ℕ0)
  nnnn0(s1)
  eqcoms(c0, nat0, w0)
  vtoclef(s0, nat0, (0 = c0 → w0))
  nfv(s0, (0 = c0 → w0))
  c0ex()
  sylbird(s0 = 0, 0 = c0, w0, s0 = c0)
  eqeq1(s0, nat0, c0)
  ex(s0 = 0, s0 = c0, w0)
  mpbii((s0 = 0 ∧ s0 = c0), w0, w2)
  sylan9bb(s0 = 0, s0 = c0, w2, w0, w1)
  bicomd(s0 = 0, w2, w1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w([1 / s0]w1)
  diff.hs0.w(w3)
  diff.hs0.w(w4)
  diff.wsb.s(s1, hs0, s0, w1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, s1, caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)

  diff.wceq.s(s0, nat0, c0)

blocks.name: zindd
blocks.content: Principle of Mathematical Induction on all integers, deduction version. The first five hypotheses give the substitutions; the last three are the basis, the induction, and the extension to negative numbers. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 17-Apr-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm zindd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5, wff w6) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wcel(c0, cz), w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), nat0), wb(w2, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w2, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)), wb(w2, w5))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(s1))), wb(w2, w6))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w2, w1))
  -| wi(w0, w3)
  -| wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cn0), wi(w4, w5)))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cn), wi(w4, w6)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w6)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
} = {
  3syl(w0, wi(wcel(c0, cz), w1), wral(s1, cz, w6), wral(s0, cz, w2))
  ralrimiv(s1, cz, w0, w6)
  syl5(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cz), w6, wo(wcel(cneg(cv(s1)), cn0), wcel(cv(s1), cn)))
  mpbid(wcel(cv(s1), cz), wo(wcel(cneg(cv(s1)), cn0), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wo(wcel(cneg(cv(s1)), cn0), wcel(cneg(cneg(cv(s1))), cn)))
  syl(wcel(cv(s1), cz), wo(wcel(cneg(cv(s1)), cn0), wcel(cneg(cneg(cv(s1))), cn)), wo(wcel(cneg(cv(s1)), cn0), wa(wcel(cneg(cv(s1)), cr), wcel(cneg(cneg(cv(s1))), cn))))
  sylib(wcel(cv(s1), cz), wo(wcel(cneg(cv(s1)), cn0), wa(wcel(cneg(cv(s1)), cr), wcel(cneg(cneg(cv(s1))), cn))), wcel(cneg(cv(s1)), cz))
  znegcl(cv(s1))
  elznn0nn(cneg(cv(s1)))
  orim2i(wcel(cneg(cv(s1)), cn0), wa(wcel(cneg(cv(s1)), cr), wcel(cneg(cneg(cv(s1))), cn)), wcel(cneg(cneg(cv(s1))), cn))
  simpr(wcel(cneg(cv(s1)), cr), wcel(cneg(cneg(cv(s1))), cn))
  orbi2d(wcel(cv(s1), cz), wcel(cneg(cv(s1)), cn0), wcel(cneg(cneg(cv(s1))), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cn))
  eleq1d(cneg(cneg(cv(s1))), cn, cv(s1), wcel(cv(s1), cz))
  negnegd(cv(s1), wcel(cv(s1), cz))
  zcn(cv(s1))
  jaod(w0, wcel(cneg(cv(s1)), cn0), wcel(cv(s1), cn), w6)
  com12(w0, wcel(cneg(cv(s1)), cn0), w6)
  nn0ind(s0, s1, cneg(cv(s1)), wi(w0, w6), wi(w0, w2), wi(w0, w3), wi(w0, w4), wi(w0, w5))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(s1))), w0, w2, w6)
  mpdd(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cn), w6, w4)
  syl11(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cn), w4, wcel(cv(s1), cn0))
  nn0ind(s0, s1, cv(s1), wi(w0, w4), wi(w0, w2), wi(w0, w3), wi(w0, w4), wi(w0, w5))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), nat0), w0, w2, w3)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)), w0, w2, w5)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, w2, w4)
  a2d(wcel(cv(s1), cn0), w0, w4, w5)
  com12(wcel(cv(s1), cn0), w0, wi(w4, w5))
  nnnn0(cv(s1))
  ralrimiv(s0, cz, wral(s1, cz, w6), w2)
  com12(wral(s1, cz, w6), wcel(cv(s0), cz), w2)
  rspcdv(s1, cz, cneg(cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), w6, w2)
  znegcl(cv(s0))
  bicomd(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(cv(s1), cneg(cv(s0)))), w6, w2)
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(cv(s1), cneg(cv(s0)))), wb(w2, w6), wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(s1))))
  eqcomd(cv(s0), cneg(cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(cv(s1), cneg(cv(s0)))))
  sylan9eqr(cneg(cv(s1)), cv(s0), cneg(cneg(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(cv(s1), cneg(cv(s0))))
  negeq(cv(s1), cneg(cv(s0)))
  negnegd(cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  zcn(cv(s0))
  rspccv(s0, cz, c0, w2, w1)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, cv(s1))
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w6)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w3)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w4)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w5)
  diff.wi.s(s1, w0, w2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wral.s(s0, s1, cz, w6)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cz)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cz.s(s1)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
}

thm zindd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5, wff w6) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ ℤ → w1))
  ⊣ (s0 = 0 →(w2 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w2 ↔ w4))
  ⊣ (s0 =(s1[+]1)→(w2 ↔ w5))
  ⊣ (s0 = -u(s1)→(w2 ↔ w6))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w2 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (w0 → w3)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s1 ∈ ℕ0 →(w4 → w5)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(s1 ∈ ℕ →(w4 → w6)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w6)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w2)
} = {
  3syl(w0, (c0 ∈ ℤ → w1), ∀(s1 ∈ ℤ, w6), ∀(s0 ∈ ℤ, w2))
  ralrimiv(s1, cz, w0, w6)
  syl5(w0, s1 ∈ ℤ, w6, (-u(s1)∈ ℕ0 ∨ s1 ∈ ℕ))
  mpbid(s1 ∈ ℤ, (-u(s1)∈ ℕ0 ∨ s1 ∈ ℕ), (-u(s1)∈ ℕ0 ∨ -u(-u(s1))∈ ℕ))
  syl(s1 ∈ ℤ, (-u(s1)∈ ℕ0 ∨ -u(-u(s1))∈ ℕ), (-u(s1)∈ ℕ0 ∨(-u(s1)∈ ℝ ∧ -u(-u(s1))∈ ℕ)))
  sylib(s1 ∈ ℤ, (-u(s1)∈ ℕ0 ∨(-u(s1)∈ ℝ ∧ -u(-u(s1))∈ ℕ)), -u(s1)∈ ℤ)
  znegcl(s1)
  elznn0nn(-u(s1))
  orim2i(-u(s1)∈ ℕ0, (-u(s1)∈ ℝ ∧ -u(-u(s1))∈ ℕ), -u(-u(s1))∈ ℕ)
  simpr(-u(s1)∈ ℝ, -u(-u(s1))∈ ℕ)
  orbi2d(s1 ∈ ℤ, -u(s1)∈ ℕ0, -u(-u(s1))∈ ℕ, s1 ∈ ℕ)
  eleq1d(-u(-u(s1)), cn, s1, s1 ∈ ℤ)
  negnegd(s1, s1 ∈ ℤ)
  zcn(s1)
  jaod(w0, -u(s1)∈ ℕ0, s1 ∈ ℕ, w6)
  com12(w0, -u(s1)∈ ℕ0, w6)
  nn0ind(s0, s1, -u(s1), (w0 → w6), (w0 → w2), (w0 → w3), (w0 → w4), (w0 → w5))
  imbi2d(s0 = -u(s1), w0, w2, w6)
  mpdd(w0, s1 ∈ ℕ, w6, w4)
  syl11(w0, s1 ∈ ℕ, w4, s1 ∈ ℕ0)
  nn0ind(s0, s1, s1, (w0 → w4), (w0 → w2), (w0 → w3), (w0 → w4), (w0 → w5))
  imbi2d(s0 = 0, w0, w2, w3)
  imbi2d(s0 =(s1[+]1), w0, w2, w5)
  imbi2d(s0 = s1, w0, w2, w4)
  a2d(s1 ∈ ℕ0, w0, w4, w5)
  com12(s1 ∈ ℕ0, w0, (w4 → w5))
  nnnn0(s1)

blocks.name: btwnz

thm btwnz(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {

  pm5.32d(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wbr(cneg(c0), clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cneg(cv(hs0)), clt, c0))
  syl5(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wb(wbr(cneg(c0), clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cneg(cv(hs0)), clt, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  nnre(cv(hs0))

  nnz(cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.c(cneg(c0))

  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, cz, wbr(cv(s0), clt, c0)))
